name: HELP! The Walls are Following Me!
name_original: HELP! The Walls are Following Me!
description:
Controls:

Movement => Arrow Keys

Jump => Space

Pause (To Restart a Level) => Esc 

Fullscreen => F11

Select a button => Enter
